review: I recently had a dental transplant procedure performed by Dr. Ramyaa karthies. I am incredibly impressed with her professionalism and skill. She was exceptionally soft and patient throughout the entire process, taking meticulous care to ensure everything was done perfectly. Her attention to detail and compassionate approach made the experience much more comfortable than I anticipated. I highly recommend Dr. Ramyaa karthiesfor anyone seeking dental care. Thank you for your outstanding service!

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Zirconia Crowns, Teeth cleaning & polishing,RCT - Root Canal Treatment,Crowns and Bridges Fixing, Tooth Extraction,
review:
Dr. Ramya gives accurate and honest dental recommendations. It was my first treatment with her, and I was immediately impressed by the manner she carried out the procedure and she explained everything to me. Thank you, doctor, for perfecting my teeth. 

My mother-in-law is also undergoing treatment there. She is always a bit scared of dental procedures. But the doctor calmed and supported her throughout the process. The doctor also explained everything in detail. My mother-in-law is happy and we highly recommend her! Thank you doctor for the time and effort.
reply_text: Thank you for your valuable response mam

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Ramyaa has been a statement of implementing stylish smiles. 
The most critical part when it comes to Full Mouth Rehabilitation is provide right solution. 
Unlike other treatments, this is a specialist task and in-addition a more complicated one considering the additional care needed for senior citizens.
Dr. Ramyaa made this a seamlessly easy one with her unique blend of expertise, knowledge and courtesy extended to us.
Had an amazing experience  and highly recommend her.
Once again, Thanks for bringing back my smiles!
reply_text: Tq sir for your valuable feedback

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Doctor Ramya provided good amount of individual attention and examined my problem and explained the causes and remedies in detail and also on how to avoid recurrence in future. She was polite in nature and was happy with her approach and she had answered all my questions, even if few was repeated. My teeth is now totally clean, good looking and I'm confident to smile. Would definitely recommend others to visit in case of any dental problems they face.

In sort hats off and thanks a ton
V.rajahramman
